text: mehi hētuva nam, niyata vaśayenma pæhædili prātihāryayan samaga ovun venuven (yavana lada apagē) dūtayin ovun veta pæmiṇeminma siṭiyaha. ehet ovun nam, “(apa men) minisunda, apaṭa ṛju mārgaya penvannan?” yayi pavasā (ovunva), ovun pratikṣēpa kara dæmūha. allāhda (ovunva) gaṇanayakaṭa gattē næta. allāh (ovungen) avaśyatāvayak novanneku vaśayen hā praśaṁsāven yutteku vaśayenda siṭinnēya
